movie.title: Blush
movie.description_intro: The sexual, psychological, and moral unraveling of an obsessive-compulsive suburban mom.
movie.description_full: The sexual, psychological, and moral unraveling of an obsessive-compulsive suburban mom.

movies.title: Cimarron
movies.summary: The epic saga of a frontier family, Cimarron starts with the Oklahoma Land Rush on 22 April 1889. The Cravet family builds their newspaper Oklahoma Wigwam into a business empire and Yancey Cravet is the adventurer-idealist who, to his wife's anger, spurns the opportunity to become governor since this means helping to defraud the native Americans of their land and resources.
movies.description_full: The epic saga of a frontier family, Cimarron starts with the Oklahoma Land Rush on 22 April 1889. movies.title: The Mystery of Picasso
movies.summary: Using a specially designed transparent 'canvas' to provide an unobstructed view, Picasso creates as the camera rolls. He begins with simple works that take shape after only a single brush stroke. He then progresses to more complex paintings, in which he repeatedly adds and removes elements, transforming the entire scene at will, until at last the work is complete.

movies.title: Kill It and Leave This Town
movies.title_english: Kill It and Leave This Town
movies.title_long: Kill It and Leave This Town (2020)
movies.summary: Fleeing from despair after losing those dearest to him, the hero hides in a safe land of memories, where time stands still and all those dear to him are alive.
movies.description_full: Fleeing from despair after losing those dearest to him, the hero hides in a safe land of memories, where time stands still and all those dear to him are alive.
movies.synopsis: Fleeing from despair after losing those dearest to him, the hero hides in a safe land of memories, where time stands still and all those dear to him are alive.

movies.title: Watch Me When I Kill
movies.summary: A pharmacist is murdered, and a woman happens to see the culprit leave the scene. She soon finds herself being stalked by the killer, and when her boyfriend tries to discover who the murderer is and stop him, he begins to find out that there is much more to the murder than the ordinary killing it first appeared to be.
